name: Website Redesign
description: Complete overhaul of company website with modern design and improved UX. This project involves updating the entire visual identity, improving user experience flows, and implementing responsive design patterns.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Native iOS and Android app for customer portal with real-time notifications, offline support, and seamless integration with existing systems.

name: E-commerce Platform
description: Build scalable online shopping platform with payment integration, inventory management, and advanced analytics dashboard.

name: Data Migration
description: Complete migration of legacy database systems to modern cloud infrastructure with zero downtime deployment.

name: API Integration
description: Integrate third-party APIs for enhanced functionality including payment processing, email services, and analytics tracking.

name: Security Audit
description: Comprehensive security review and implementation of best practices across all systems and applications.
